data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Lindi, Tanzania will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lindi, Tanzania
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Lindi words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary: On average, 139 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Lindi, Tanzania.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, please defend the 95,028 believers in Lindi against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Lindi. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Ndengereko people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Ndengereko people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Ndengereko people is yours.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 95,028 believers in the state of Lindi.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Lindi who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Lindi, Tanzania has a population of 864,700.

We estimate Lindi has 95,028 people who might know Jesus, 346,953 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 422,719 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Lindi, Tanzania.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
